CustomField.formula: Name &"-"& TEXT(Job_Type__c)&"-"& SAP_Service_Contract_Job_Number__c &"-"& Superintendent__r.FirstName &" "& Superintendent__r.LastName &" ("&text( Status__c )&")"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Name, Work Type, Superintendent and (Status) for quick reference in lookup
CustomField.label: Lookup Formula
